title: Views of Artisana Volcano from or near Quito, and a Cloudy Sky over a Mountain Ridge, Ecuador
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored paper
description: Horizontal view of Artisana peaks and a lower mountain rising above the clouds and low ridges on the upper portion of the sheet with a cloudy sky over ridges separated by a line on the lower portion.
name: Drawing
